reviews.text: If I could give 6/5 stars, I would. I had a great time at Xi Xia this past weekend. We came at peak lunchtime on Saturday and were seated right away. You...
So, in full disclosure- I'm being selfish - because I need this place to be successful so that my tastebuds remain as happy as they are after my first meal...
